meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6585.

td.p: Matt Eichenbaum, an orthopedic surgeon from Kennett Square, Pennsylvania
Mona Miller, a lawyer and writer from Los Angeles, California
Adam Holquist, an environmental engineer from Erie, Pennsylvania (whose 3-day cash winnings total $76,299)

tr.td: ENTERTAINING FOOD & DRINK
GO "APE"
HISTORICAL GEOGRAPHIC AKAs
BLANKING ON THE BIBLE
THE RICH MAN'S...
THE POOR MAN'S

tr.td: Adam
Mona
Matt
AUTHORESS! AUTHORESS!
MUSICIAN MOVIE SUBJECTS
HISTORICAL BLINDNESS
THE WAR OF 1812
"G" PLUS 3
(Alex: 4-letter responses with each one beginning with the letter "G".)
HANOI
(Jimmy: [*], the capital of Vietnam, a fascinating blend of East & West and a rising star in southeast Asia.)

$5,600
MattWhat is the Nobel Prize?
$12,297
the Nobel Prize')
